About

Some of my goals are to find my first full time job as a software developer, and to gain firsthand knowledge/experience of the software development life cycle.

I'm hoping to use the knowledge I've learn to assist in a software development process an also willing to be challenged to further build and improve myself as a developer. I plan to continuously work on my skills to be able to efficiently and effectively contribute to a growing and ever necessary industry.
